GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15
GSD.description:
net: mscc: ocelot: avoid overflowing the PTP timestamp FIFO

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15 by commit 52849bcf0029ccc553be304e4f804938a39112e2, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 4e3b0468e6d7f3c38ce52320803769b49ba87930. For more details please see the references link.
